head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths WRIGHT, ELFREDA S.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths WRIGHT, ELFREDA S.

block.p: WRIGHT-Elfreda S. Died on July 24th at Beth Israel Medical Center. A retired prinipal at Wadleigh Junior High School. Devoted mother to John Wright, loving mother-inlaw to Nanette Wright, beloved sister of Justice Jawn A. Sandifer and Paul Sandifer, cherished grandmother of John Herbert and Corinne S. Wright. Visitation, Thursday, July 27th 3:30-8:30PM at Benta's Funeral Home, Inc., 630 St. Nicholas Avenue, NYC. Funeral Service, Friday July 28th at 10:00AM at St. Mark's United Methodist Church, 55 Edgecombe Ave. at West 137th Street. Interment: Heavenly Rest Memorial Park Cemetery, East Hanover, NJ.

Funeral Service, Friday July 28th at 10:00AM at St. Mark's United Methodist Church, 55 Edgecombe Ave. at West 137th Street. Interment: Heavenly Rest Memorial Park Cemetery, East Hanover, NJ.
